findings.message: Blast-radius statement says KeycardCountForm.tsx is optional, but keycard blind/reveal is explicitly in scope and task seeds require KeycardCountForm prop changes. Internal scope inconsistency.
Implementation confidence says only two files change, but tests also require updates. Understates actual change surface.
Follow the safe-reconcile reveal pattern exactly conflicts with the proposed broader else if (!showExpected) condition. Wording should be aligned to avoid ambiguity.
Outcome contract still has Why: TBD despite Status: Ready-for-planning.
